data.title: Tourist Potentials of Bosnia and Herzegovina Issue 1
data.meta_description: 39938583 Tourist Potentials of Bosnia and Herzegovina Issue 1 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document discusses the tourism potential of Bosnia and Herzegovina. It highlights the country's natural beauty, including over 100 "must see" locations, as well as its diverse history, culture, and cuisine. The tourism minister believes Bosnia and Herzegovina has what the market demands - pristine nature and ecologically preserved spaces. If the country realizes its goals, tourism can become a strategic economic sector by capitalizing on the country's unique attributes and resources.
data.text: Tourist Potentials of Bosnia and Herzegovina Issue 1
